review.title: “So far, so good.”
review.pros: Pros – Good promotion aspects and good safety culture.
review.cons: Cons – Management company, so superintendents prefer to provide cheap and substandard stores and spares to appease the owners and superiors.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – MLC compliant flag state vessels must be included in the fleet, and 24X7 internet facility must be provided to crew.

review.title: “amazing experience working with the biggest manpower company in the world”
review.pros: Pros – safety has always been their top concern,training the seafarer to global standards is one good point.
review.cons: Cons – average salary compared to rest of the industry.
review.advice-to-management: Yes, I would recommend this company to a friend – I'm optimistic about the outlook for this company

review.title: “Good if not Excellent.Company.”
review.pros: Pros – Good Company to work with. Procedures and policies are established and followed. No shortcuts allowed.Easily one of the better companies to work with.
review.cons: Cons – Different parties are responsible of different departments. Multiplication of paper work involved. The industry itself is going through a downturn so You can not blame the Company.
review.advice-to-management: Yes, I would recommend this company to a friend
